SimpleBearing¶

class +AMrotorSIM.+Components.+Bearings.@SimpleBearing.SimpleBearing(arg)¶

Bases: AMrotorSIM.Components.Bearings.Bearing

SimpleAxialBearing acts on the x and y direction of the corresponding node Add stiffness and damping on the x and y degrees of freedom of the closest node of the rotor
